name: CNN
text: Boeing has restarted production of the troubled 737 Max, even though the Federal Aviation Administration has yet to give its approval for the jet to fly again, and as demand for new jets has ground to a near halt along with demand for air travel https://t.co/FYqWE9rO2B

name: CNN
text:
On Tuesday, Twitter labeled two tweets from President Trump about mail-in ballots with a fact check, in a first for the company.

But rival Facebook confirmed to CNN Business it plans to take no action with an identical post from Trump on its platform. https://t.co/miTTy9DbuU

name: CNN
text: Salvadoran President Nayib Bukele said he uses hydroxychloroquine, the anti-malarial drug touted by US President Trump as a potential coronavirus cure, even though experts have questioned its efficacy for Covid-19 and have warned of harmful side-effects https://t.co/C4caPlY4LF

name: CNN
text:
"Now Entering Michigan: Really? You're sure about this?"

Two billboards suggest travelers may want to think twice before visiting Michigan.

But the man behind the billboards said they are actually meant to support Michiganders during their quarantine. https://t.co/e4eVPOn1OC

name: CNN
text: The first tragedy of America's bleak coronavirus milestone is that 100,000 people didn't have to die. The second is that no one knows how many more will perish before the pandemic fades. | Analysis by @StCollinson https://t.co/NL1FRCl1H9

name: CNN
text: President Trump threatened to "regulate" or even "close" down social media platforms after Twitter added a fact-check label to some of his posts. But Trump's options regarding these platforms are somewhat limited, legal experts say. https://t.co/kLfn7rLcfv

name: CNN
text:
In a matter of months, more than 100,000 deaths from Covid-19 have been reported on American soil, according to figures from Johns Hopkins University.

A timeline of this grim reality reveals a country trying to come to terms with the crisis. https://t.co/wp9BDb0Qkc https://t.co/j8vPNk6kE3

name: CNN
text:
George Floyd moved to Minnesota "to be his best self," as one friend put it.

But he died Monday in the city he moved to for a better life, his last moments caught on video as he was held down by a Minneapolis police officer's knee while being arrested. https://t.co/bOGgFiLEo0

text: Dr. Anthony Fauci said data shows hydroxychloroquine is not an effective treatment for the coronavirus, disputing use of the drug to fight the deadly virus even as President Trump touts it as a potential cure and says he has taken it himself https://t.co/YiNve0Y4rL

name: CNN
text:
